choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
I'm happy to help you with your dietary needs! Here is a healthy meal plan for seven days:
Day 1: Oatmeal with dairy-free milk, scrambled eggs, and fruit salad.
Day 2: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables.
Day 3: Lentil soup with spinach and kale.
Day 4: Grilled chicken breast with sweet potatoes and carrots.
Day 5: Baked salmon with asparagus and brussels sprouts.
Day 6: Vegetable stir-fry with tofu, tempe, and seitan.
Day 7: Smoothie bowl with frozen yogurt, fresh berries, and nuts.
I hope this meal plan helps you maintain a healthy diet while traveling!
